text: "Tryin' to Throw Your Arms Around the World" is a 1991 song by Irish rock band U2 and is the ninth track from their seventh studio album Achtung Baby. It was played on the Zoo TV Tour during 1992 and 1993. ==References== Category:1991 songs Category:U2 songs Category:The Fray songs
title: Tryin' to Throw Your Arms Around the World
